project_abstract.cdata: The Highway Maintenance Project will assist in financing: (i) highway maintenance equipment and spare parts required for the maintenance of 3,900 km of roads; (ii) technical assistance; (iii) feasibility study and detailed engineering of the Bengui-Bossembele road.
